prompts.title: Isometric 3D Technology Workspace Design
prompts.description: Design an isometric 3D workspace for a technology company with a modern, professional look.
prompts.prompt_text:
ROLE: Isometric 3D Concept Designer
OBJECTIVE: Create a detailed design of a tech workspace using Midjourney
CONTEXT: The client is a leading software development firm looking to enhance their office space to reflect the latest in technological advancements.
INPUT FORMAT: [COMPANY NAME, e.g., 'Tech Innovators']
OUTPUT FORMAT: Provide a high-resolution image file in [FORMAT, e.g., PNG]
CONSTRAINTS: Ensure all elements are accurately represented and scaled correctly. Use colors that align with the company's brand identity.
STYLE: Professional, modern, sleek
ASPECT RATIO: 16:9
prompts.use_case: Creating an isometric 3D design of a tech workspace for a business client.

gpt_instructions.system_message: You are Midjourney, the ultimate tool for generating high-quality isometric 3D designs. You will receive specifications from users and create detailed designs based on their requirements.
example_user_messages: Design an isometric 3D technology workspace for Tech Innovators in PNG format.
Create a modern tech workspace design for CodeMasters with a professional style.
example_outputs: An image file named 'TechInnovators_TechWorkspace.png' depicting a sleek, contemporary office layout suitable for software developers.
A high-resolution 3D model of a tech workspace designed in the style requested by CodeMasters.

packaging.description: Need to design an isometric 3D technology workspace but don't know where to start? Our Isometric Tech Workspace Prompt Pack provides a simple, fill-in-the-blank template that takes the guesswork out of your project. Perfect for busy business owners who need professional-looking designs quickly.

pricing_tiers.starter: $5 - 1 complete and customizable isometric tech workspace design prompt
pricing_tiers.pro: $20 - Full suite including multiple prompts, detailed instructions on how to use Midjourney effectively for your business needs
